hero.title: The future is in our hands
hero.subtitle: Together we will achieve a bright tomorrow: this is our contribution to shaping the future.

workWith.title: Gender Equality
workWith.subTitle: How to achieve equality among people
workWith.text: Ensuring full respect for women's rights is crucial for the development of a thriving society. Investments in gender equality contribute to reducing the wage gap between men and women.

workWith.title: Quality Education
workWith.subTitle: How to create an effective system of education and development
workWith.text: The quality of education influences the level of societal well-being, and the opportunity for lifelong learning for each individual refreshes the capital of responses to the challenges of our present.

workWith.title: Innovation and Infrastructure
workWith.subTitle: How to develop quality, reliable, sustainable, and accessible infrastructure
workWith.text: The development of infrastructure and innovation is a prerequisite for economic progress. Technological progress ensures the resolution of environmental and economic issues and can influence social factors.

workWith.title: Partnership for Sustainable Development
workWith.subTitle: How to develop collaborative relationships in governance
workWith.text: Focus on achieving partnerships in the financial, technological, and trade sectors, as well as promoting collaboration between the public and private sectors.

workWith.title: Peace and Justice
workWith.subTitle: How to create a peaceful society
workWith.text: One of the most crucial priorities of sustainable development is the creation of peaceful, just, and inclusive societies based on respect for human rights, the rule of law, and good governance.

popupCookie.text: This website uses cookies for the proper functioning and improvement of the service. If you agree to their use, click OK.

description.text: Our foundation is looking for partners who share our mission and are ready to support our project. If you want to get involved with our work, we encourage you to fill out this form. The information posted in this questionnaire will help us identify possible forms and direct procedures. Thank you for your interest in our foundation.

waysSupport.name: waysSupport
waysSupport.title: What ways of support are you ready to look at?

descriptionTermsAgreement.name: descriptionTermsAgreement
descriptionTermsAgreement.description: I agree to the terms of use and consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the privacy policy and GDPR

form.coreMsg: If you have the relevant experience and want to join one of our initiatives, your work will be very important. Human values are what underlies all philanthropy, because what is needed most is not money, but people.

description.text: Our foundation would like the participation of volunteers to support our mission. If you share our mission, values and are willing to go through our system, we would like you to fill out this form. The information posted in this application form is kept confidential and will help us find the most satisfying and rewarding volunteer job for you. Thank you for your interest in our foundation.

form.titleSpheres: Which volunteer spheres are you willing to consider?
form.titleReason: Why do you want to be a volunteer? (optional)
form.descriptionCar: Do you have your own car?
form.descriptionTermsAgreement: I agree to the terms of use and consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the privacy policy and GDPR
form.descriptionVolunteersAgreement: As a volunteer of our organization, I agree to adhere to internal policies and procedures. I agree that all work I perform is done on a voluntary basis.
